analysisTypes.summaryDescription: Comprehensive overview with key topics, decisions, and action items in a structured format

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Transform your audio into actionable insights in three simple steps

step1.title: Upload Your Audio
step1.description: Drag and drop or select any audio file up to 5GB. We support all common formats including M4A, MP3, WAV, and more.

step2.title: AI Transcription
step2.description: Our advanced AI transcribes your audio with high accuracy, automatically handling multiple languages.

step3.title: Smart Summary
step3.description: Get an intelligent summary with key points, action items, decisions, and behavioral insights - all formatted for easy reading.

recordingGuide.title: Recording Guide
recordingGuide.subtitle: Get the best transcription results with these recording tips

environment.title: Choose a Quiet Environment
environment.description: Record in a quiet room with minimal background noise for best results.

microphone.title: Use a Good Microphone
microphone.description: Built-in phone mics work well, but external microphones provide better quality.

speaking.title: Speak Clearly
speaking.description: Speak at a normal pace and articulate clearly. Avoid talking over others.

format.title: Audio Format
format.description: We support M4A, MP3, WAV, and other common formats. Higher quality formats yield better results.

proTips.title: Pro recording tips for best results
proTips.audioQualityDesc: Record in a quiet environment, speak clearly, and maintain consistent distance from the microphone
proTips.useHeadphonesDesc: If recording a video call, use headphones to prevent echo
proTips.fileSizeDesc: For files over 25MB, ensure stable internet connection during upload
proTips.formatDesc: We support M4A, MP3, WAV, MP4, WEBM, and MPEG formats up to 100MB

ios.name: iPhone / iPad
steps: Open the Voice Memos app (pre-installed on all iOS devices)
Tap the red record button to start recording
Place your device 6-12 inches from the speaker for optimal quality
Tap stop when finished
Tap the recording to rename it
Tap the share button and select 'Save to Files' or upload directly to our site
tips: Use a quiet room with minimal echo
Consider using AirPods or external mic for better quality

android.name: Android
steps: Open your default Voice Recorder app (or download one from Play Store)
Tap the record button to start
Hold your phone 6-12 inches from the speaker
Tap stop when finished
Save the recording with a descriptive name
Share via email, cloud storage, or upload directly to our site
tips: Turn on 'Do Not Disturb' mode to avoid interruptions
Use the phone's bottom microphone for better pickup
Keep the device steady during recording

mac.name: Mac
steps: Open QuickTime Player (found in Applications folder)
Go to File > New Audio Recording
Click the red record button
Position yourself 1-2 feet from the built-in microphone
Click stop when finished
Save the file (File > Save) and upload to our site
tips: Use an external USB microphone for professional quality
Close other applications to avoid notification sounds
Record in a room with soft furnishings to reduce echo

apps.name: GarageBand
apps.description: Advanced features for music and podcasting

windows.name: Windows PC
steps: Open Voice Recorder app (search for it in Start menu)
Click the microphone button to start recording
Speak clearly into your computer's microphone
Click stop when finished
The recording will be saved automatically
Right-click the recording to find the file location and upload
tips: Use a USB headset for better audio quality
Close browser tabs and other apps to reduce background noise
Position the microphone away from keyboard and mouse

videoCall.title: Recording a video call or meeting?
videoCall.description: Most video conferencing tools (Zoom, Teams, Google Meet) have built-in recording features. Simply record your meeting and upload the video file directly - we'll extract and transcribe the audio!

hero.body: You make the calls â€” literally. Neural Summary turns every meeting into searchable transcripts, summaries, and
hero.bodyEnd: . Nothing gets lost. Nothing needs to be rewritten.
hero.socialProof: Trusted by 2,400+ founders, team leads & consultants

card.speakerAText: If we skip recording this, we lose all the context around why we chose this direction.
card.speakerBText: Neural Summary turns every recording into a searchable record automatically.

proofBar.quote1: We used to spend 30 minutes after every client call writing up notes. Now Neural Summary does it
proofBar.quote2: It's changed how our whole team operates.
proofBar.name: Elena Varga
proofBar.title: Managing Partner Â· Varga Consulting

compatibility.body: No bots sitting awkwardly in your meetings. No installs. No permissions popups. Neural Summary works with any recording â€” live or uploaded â€” from any platform.

meet.name: Google Meet
meet.desc: Record and auto-upload directly from Meet

teams.name: Microsoft Teams
teams.desc: Full transcript support for Teams recordings

anyAudio.name: Any audio file
anyAudio.desc: Upload MP3, MP4, WAV â€” we handle the rest

compatibility.noBotCalloutBody: Unlike Otter, Fireflies, or Fathom â€” Neural Summary never joins your call as a participant. Your meetings stay yours.

outputs.body: Every meeting is full of ideas, decisions, and content waiting to be used. Neural Summary's template library turns any recording into professional assets â€” for every team, every use case.

sales.title: Sales
sales.subtitle: Close faster, follow up smarter
sales.chips: Price quote,Follow-up email,Discovery summary,Objection log,Proposal brief

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.subtitle: Turn conversations into content

product.subtitle: Ship faster, document better

tech.title: Tech & Engineering
tech.subtitle: Keep the team aligned
tech.chips: Architecture notes,Action items,Tech spec draft,Incident debrief,Standup summary

ask.body: What was decided in last Tuesday's board call? What did the client say about pricing? Who owns the launch timeline? Stop digging through notes. Just ask.

timestamps.title: Answers with timestamps
timestamps.desc: Every response cites the exact moment in the recording â€” so you can verify, share, or jump straight to the context.

search.title: Search across all meetings
search.desc: Query a single call or your entire meeting history. Find any decision, any commitment, any name â€” instantly.

languages.title: Works in 99+ languages
languages.desc: Ask in English. Your meeting was in French. Neural Summary handles both â€” and everything in between.

chat.userMsg1: What were the main action items from this call?
chat.aiReply1a: Three action items: Sarah to finalize the Q3 hiring plan
chat.aiReply1b: , Marcus to complete the infrastructure audit
chat.aiReply1c: , and Priya to send the revised deck to investors by Friday.
chat.userMsg2: What objections did the investors raise?
chat.aiReply2a: Two main objections: concerns about CAC in the enterprise segment
chat.aiReply2b: and a question about the competitive moat against Otter and Fireflies.
chat.inputPlaceholder: Ask a question about this meeting...

infrastructure.body: Neural Summary is built on best-in-class speech recognition infrastructure â€” the same technology trusted by thousands of enterprise teams worldwide. You get production-grade accuracy from day one, with no tuning, no setup, and no compromises.

languages.label: Languages supported
languages.desc: From English and Mandarin to Arabic and Dutch â€” your global meetings are covered, without any setup.

accuracy.label: Transcription accuracy
accuracy.desc: Industry-leading word error rate. Names, jargon, and domain-specific terms handled correctly, first time.

speed.label: Faster than real-time
speed.desc: A 60-minute meeting is fully transcribed, summarized, and ready to act on in under 15 minutes.

integrations.body: No new tools to adopt. Neural Summary pushes your transcripts, summaries, and AI-generated assets directly into the platforms your team lives in.

testimonials.tag: Trusted by people who run things

t1.quote1: I run 12 client calls a week. Before Neural Summary, I was losing
t1.quote2: Now that time goes back into actual client work.
t1.name: Elena Varga

t2.quote1: The AI chat is what sold me. I can ask 'what did we decide about the pricing model in March' and
t2.quoteStrong: get the answer with a timestamp in 3 seconds.
t2.name: Marcus Reinholt

t3.quote1: Our product team records every discovery call and turns them into feature briefs automatically.
t3.name: Priya Chandra
t3.role: Head of Product Â· Lumen Labs

security.body: Your meetings contain sensitive client information, strategic decisions, and confidential discussions. We treat your data with the same seriousness you do â€” with enterprise-grade security, GDPR compliance, and full data ownership from day one.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliant
gdpr.desc: EU data residency available. Full compliance with European privacy law.

encrypted.title: Encrypted at rest
encrypted.desc: All recordings and transcripts encrypted with AES-256.

autoDelete.title: Auto-delete policy
autoDelete.desc: Set data retention rules. Recordings deleted automatically on your schedule.

ownership.title: You own your data
ownership.desc: Your recordings are never used to train AI models. Full export available anytime.

pricing.body: No surprise fees. No per-seat traps. Choose the plan that fits how you work.

starter.features: 5 recordings / month,Transcripts & summaries,3 asset templates,AI chat (10 queries/mo)

pro.features: Unlimited recordings,All asset templates,Unlimited AI chat,All integrations,Priority support

team.features: Everything in Pro,Shared meeting library,Team folders & permissions,GDPR data residency,Dedicated onboarding

finalCta.body: Stop losing what gets said in meetings. Start turning every conversation into something your business can actually use.

meta.title: Terms of Use - Neural Summary
meta.description: Terms of Use for Neural Summary's AI-powered conversation processing and AI Asset generation service. GDPR compliant terms and conditions.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Neural Summary ('Service'), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use ('Terms'). If you disagree with any part of these terms, you do not have permission to access the Service.
acceptance.notice: These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and DreamOne Holding BV regarding your use of the Service.

serviceDescription.title: Service Description
serviceDescription.content: Neural Summary provides AI-powered conversation processing and intelligent AI Asset generation services. Our platform includes:

features.transcription: Automatic processing of audio files into conversations using advanced AI technology
features.analysis: Intelligent AI Asset generation from your conversation content
features.storage: Secure cloud storage of your conversations. Audio files are retained for 30 days for support purposes, then automatically deleted
features.sharing: Ability to share conversations with controlled access

pricing.title: Pricing and Payment Terms
pricing.content: We reserve the right to modify our pricing at any time to reflect changes in operational costs, market conditions, service improvements, or other business factors.

changes.title: Price Changes
changes.content: We will provide at least 30 days advance notice before any price changes take effect for existing subscriptions. New pricing will apply to renewals after the notice period.
changes.notice: Continued use of the Service after a price change becomes effective constitutes acceptance of the new pricing.

billing.title: Billing and Subscriptions
billing.content: Subscription fees are billed in advance on a recurring basis (monthly or annually). You are responsible for maintaining valid payment information.

fairUse.title: Usage Limits and Fair Use Policy
fairUse.content: All subscriptions and usage are subject to our Fair Use Policy. We reserve the right to modify usage limits to ensure service quality and availability for all users.

policy.title: Fair Use Definition
policy.content: Fair use means using the Service in a reasonable manner consistent with typical personal or business use. Excessive, abusive, or automated usage that degrades service performance for other users is prohibited.

modifications.title: Modifications to Usage Limits
modifications.content: We may adjust usage limits based on system capacity, abuse prevention, cost optimization, or service improvements. Users will be notified of any material changes to their plan limits with reasonable advance notice.

enforcement.title: Enforcement
enforcement.content: Violations of the Fair Use Policy may result in temporary usage restrictions, account suspension, or termination. We will make reasonable efforts to notify users before taking enforcement action.

userObligations.title: User Obligations and Responsibilities
userObligations.content: As a user of our Service, you agree to use Neural Summary responsibly and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.illegal: Upload or process content that violates any laws or regulations
prohibited.harmful: Use the Service to harm, threaten, or harass others
prohibited.unauthorized: Access or attempt to access unauthorized areas of the Service
prohibited.interference: Interfere with or disrupt the Service or servers
prohibited.reverseEngineering: Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble any part of the Service

ownership.title: Service Ownership
ownership.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by DreamOne Holding BV and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.

userContent.title: Your Content
userContent.content: You retain all rights to the conversations and AI Assets you create using the Service. By uploading content, you grant us a limited license to process, store, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the Service to you.

license.title: License Grant
license.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Service for your personal or internal business purposes, subject to these Terms.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your use of the Service is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.

gdpr.title: GDPR Compliance
gdpr.content: We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and provide you with the following rights:

rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.erasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.disclaimer: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS' WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.

limitations.title: Liability Limitations
limitations.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, DreamOne Holding BV shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use the Service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms.

consequences.title: Effects of Termination
consequences.accessRevoked: Your right to use the Service will cease immediately
consequences.dataRetention: We may retain certain data as required by law or for legitimate business purposes
consequences.obligations: All provisions of the Terms which should survive termination shall survive

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of The Netherlands, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

amendments.title: Amendments to Terms
amendments.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the 'Effective Date'.

enterprise.description: For teams that need control, consistency, and compliance.

finalCta.title: Start creating smarter
finalCta.subtitle: Transform your conversations into professional documents

comparison.title: Compare plans
comparison.subtitle: Find the perfect plan for your needs

trial.question: How does the 14-day free trial work?
trial.answer: Start your trial with full access to all Pro features. No credit card required. At the end of 14 days, choose to subscribe or continue with our free plan.

cost.question: How much does Neural Summary cost?
cost.answer: Pro plan is {professionalPrice}/month or {annualPrice}/year (save 25%). Additional hours beyond 60/month are {overageRate} each. Free plan includes 5 conversations/month.

overage.question: What happens if I exceed my monthly limit?
overage.answer: Pro users are automatically charged {overageRate} per additional hour of audio processing. Free users can upgrade to Pro or wait for the next month.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel anytime. Your subscription remains active until the end of your billing period, and you won't be charged again.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
upgrade.answer: Yes! Upgrades take effect immediately with prorated charges. Downgrades take effect at the end of your current billing period.

enterprise.question: What's included in the Enterprise plan?
enterprise.answer: Enterprise includes unlimited processing, SSO (coming soon), custom integrations, dedicated support, and custom contracts. Contact our sales team for pricing.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals using Neural Summary to save time and improve their work.

meta.title: Privacy Policy - Neural Summary
meta.description: Privacy Policy for Neural Summary. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your conversations and AI Assets in compliance with GDPR.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: At Neural Summary, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service. We comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and are committed to protecting your personal data.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:

dataCollected.title: What Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We collect different types of information to provide and improve our Service:

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.name: Name (optional)
personal.payment: Payment information (processed securely via third-party providers)

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.audioFiles: Audio files you upload for processing

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:

contract.title: Contract Performance
contract.content: Processing necessary to provide you with our conversation processing and AI Asset generation services.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: Processing based on your explicit consent for marketing communications and analytics.

legitimate.title: Legitimate Interests
legitimate.content: Processing necessary for our legitimate interests in improving our services and preventing fraud.

legal.title: Legal Obligations
legal.content: Processing necessary to comply with legal obligations, such as tax and accounting requirements.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use the collected data for various purposes:

purposes.service: To provide and maintain our conversation processing and AI Asset generation services
purposes.communication: To communicate with you about your account and service updates
purposes.improvement: To improve and personalize your experience
purposes.security: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats
purposes.compliance: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms
purposes.analytics: To analyze usage patterns and improve our service (with your consent)

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.content: We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our Service:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.hosting: Enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure for secure data storage and processing
serviceProviders.transcription: Industry-leading speech-to-text services for accurate transcription
serviceProviders.analysis: Enterprise-grade AI models for intelligent content analysis
serviceProviders.email: Secure email delivery services for transactional communications

dataSharing.notice: We never sell your personal data to third parties. All service providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and can only use your data to provide services to us.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy:

userRights.title: Your Rights Under GDPR
userRights.content: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

access.title: Right to Access
access.content: You have the right to request copies of your personal data we hold.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.content: You have the right to request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.content: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.content: You have the right to receive your data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.

restriction.title: Right to Restrict Processing
restriction.content: You have the right to request restriction of processing under certain circumstances.

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.content: You have the right to object to processing based on legitimate interests or for direct marketing.

withdraw.title: Right to Withdraw Consent
withdraw.content: Where processing is based on consent, you have the right to withdraw consent at any time.

userRights.howToExercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at the email address provided below.
userRights.responseTime: We will respond to your request within 30 days as required by GDPR.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

measures.title: Security Measures
measures.encryption: End-to-end encryption for data in transit and at rest
measures.access: Strict access controls and authentication mechanisms
measures.monitoring: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection
measures.backup: Regular backups and disaster recovery procedures
measures.training: Regular security training for our staff
measures.incident: Incident response and breach notification procedures

dataSecurity.breach: In the event of a data breach that poses a risk to your rights and freedoms, we will notify you and the relevant supervisory authority within 72 hours as required by GDPR.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to improve your experience:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: Required for the Service to function properly (authentication, security)

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: Help us understand how users interact with our Service (with your consent)

cookies.manage: You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or our cookie consent tool.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: Your data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside the European Economic Area (EEA).

safeguards.title: Safeguards
safeguards.scc: Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission
safeguards.adequacy: Adequacy decisions for countries with equivalent data protection laws
safeguards.shield: Appropriate safeguards as required by GDPR Article 46

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our Service is not intended for children, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from anyone under the age specified below.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

supervisory.title: Supervisory Authority
supervisory.content: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection supervisory authority:

updates.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
updates.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated 'Last Updated' date.
updates.notification: For material changes, we will notify you via email or through a prominent notice on our Service.

trial.daysRemaining: {days} days left in your Pro trial
trial.alreadyUsed: You've already used your free trial

qa.noResults: I couldn't find relevant information about that.

folderPicker.noFoldersYet: No folders yet. Create one above.

templateSelector.templateSelected: Selected template will guide the AI output generation
templateSelector.skipHint: You can skip this step and generate outputs later
templateSelector.continueWithOutputs: Continue with transcription + {count, plural, =1 {# output} other {# outputs}}

errors.emptySearch: Please enter text to search for

meta.title: Examples | Neural Summary
meta.description: One conversation becomes four work-ready outputs. See the transformation.

hero.headline: One conversation. Endless possibilities.
hero.subtitle: See what Neural Summary creates from a single meeting.

items.task: Finalize Q1 launch timeline and share with stakeholders
Review beta feedback and prioritize bug fixes
Prepare press release and media kit
Schedule customer webinar for launch week

email.subject: Product Launch Planning - Next Steps
email.intro: Here's the recap from today's meeting on our Q1 product launch.
decisions: Beta program extended by one week for additional testing
Marketing budget approved for influencer campaign

blogPost.headline: What We Learned Shipping in January
blogPost.subheading: Lessons from our team on building momentum before day one
blogPost.hook: The old playbook says wait until perfect. We tried something different.
blogPost.body: Our beta testers weren't just finding bugs. They were shaping the product direction. Their feedback led us to pivot our onboarding flow entirely. The result: a 40% improvement in activation rates before we even launched.

quote.text: The product felt like it was built for us, not just sold to us.

linkedin.hook: We almost delayed our launch by 3 months.
bullets: Your first users define your product
linkedin.result: 2,000 signups in the first week. Not because we were perfect. Because we were present.
linkedin.callToAction: What's the biggest lesson from your last launch?

items.task: Send proposal with three package options
Schedule technical deep-dive with their CTO
Prepare case study from similar fintech project

email.subject: Great speaking with you - Next steps
email.intro: Thank you for taking the time to walk me through your challenges today. Your team's situation is exactly the kind of problem we specialize in solving.
decisions: Mobile-first approach aligned with your user demographics
Phased rollout starting with core payment features
Integration with your existing Salesforce instance
email.closing: Looking forward to the possibility of working together.

blogPost.headline: The Discovery Call That Changed How I Sell
blogPost.subheading: Why listening beats pitching every time
blogPost.hook: I used to walk into discovery calls with a deck. Now I walk in with questions.
blogPost.body: The client mentioned their real problem 47 minutes in. If I had been pitching, I would have missed it entirely. Their team wasn't struggling with technology. They were drowning in manual processes that nobody had time to fix.

quote.text: You understood our problem before we finished explaining it.

blogPost.imageAlt: Abstract shapes representing conversation and connection

communicationAnalysis.overallAssessment: Strong discovery skills with room to deepen client understanding. You ask good questions but could let answers breathe more.

clarity.name: Clarity
clarity.improvement: Summarize key points before moving on
